value.title: Power BI Paginated Reports in a Day - 22: Bonus Content: Review
value.excerpt: In this video, Peter Myers presents a mind map bringing together the report design concepts and how they relate.  The Power BI Paginated Reports in a Day online course aims to empower you as a report author with the technical knowledge required to create, publish, and distribute Power BI paginated reports.
